name: sqlite-utils
summary: Python CLI utility and library for manipulating SQLite databases.

name: datasette
summary: An open source multi-tool for exploring and publishing data.

name: simple-graph
summary: A graph database in SQLite inspired by 'SQLite as a document database'.

name: rqlite
summary: A distributed relational database.

name: sqleton
summary: A tool to visualise SQLite database schemas.

name: sqlite-parquet-vtable
summary: A SQLite virtual table extension to expose Parquet files as SQL tables.

name: SQLCipher
summary: A SQLite extension adding on-the-fly encryption, tamper detection, strong key derivation and memory sanitisation.

name: Litestream
summary: Litestream is a standalone streaming replication tool for SQLite.

name: SpatiaLite
summary: A library intended to extend the SQLite core to support fully fledged Spatial SQL capabilities.

name: SQLean
summary: Extends SQLite with json1, math, re, stats, text, unicode and vsv at once.

name: sqlitebiter
summary: A CLI tool to convert CSV / Excel / HTML / JSON / Jupyter Notebook / LDJSON / LTSV / Markdown / SQLite / SSV / TSV / Google-Sheets to a SQLite database file.

name: LiteTree
summary: A modified version of the SQLite engine to support branches a-la Git.

name: bibliothecula
summary: Document organizer with tags and full-text-search, in a simple and clean sqlite3 schema

name: deno-sqlite
summary: A Deno module with SQLite embedded as WebAssembly

name: sqlime
summary: An online SQLite playground for debugging and sharing SQL snippets. Kinda like JSFiddle or CodePen, but for SQL instead of JavaScript.

name: Verneuil
summary: Verneuil is a VFS extension for SQLite that asynchronously replicates databases to S3-compatible blob stores.

name: git-history
summary: Tools for analyzing Git history using SQLite

name: XLite
summary: A SQLite extension to query Excel files as virtual tables.

name: sqlite-zstd
summary: Transparent dictionary-based row-level compression for SQLite.

name: sqlite-lines
summary: A SQLite extension for reading large files line-by-line (NDJSON, logs, txt, etc.)

name: sqlite-html
summary: A SQLite extension for querying, manipulating, and creating HTML elements.

name: marmot
summary: A distributed SQLite replicator.

name: libSQL
summary: LibSQL is a fork of SQLite that is both Open Source, and Open Contributions.

name: ChiselStore
summary: ChiselStore is an embeddable, distributed SQLite for Rust, powered by Little Raft.

name: Dqlite
summary: Dqlite is a fast, embedded, persistent SQL database with Raft consensus that is perfect for fault-tolerant IoT and Edge devices.

name: sqlite-difftable
summary: Tools for dumping/loading a SQLite database to diffable directory structure - GitHub - simonw/sqlite-diffable: Tools for dumping/loading a SQLite database to diffable directory structure.

name: Ploomber
summary: The fastest way to build data pipelines. Develop iteratively, deploy anywhere.

name: libgsqlite
summary: A SQLite extension which loads a Google Sheet as a virtual table.

name: cr-sqlite
summary: Convergent, Replicated SQLite. Multi-writer and CRDT support for SQLite.

name: SQL Teaching
summary: An interactive tutorial to learn the rudiments of SQL using SQLite in the browser.

name: sqlite-loadable-rs
summary: A framework for writing fast and performant SQLite extensions in Rust

name: mvSQLite
summary: MVCC SQLite that runs on FoundationDB.

name: litefs
summary: FUSE-based file system for replicating SQLite databases across a cluster of machines

name: pivot_vtab
summary: An extension implementing pivot tables as virtual tables.

name: sqlite-xsv
summary: A SQLite extension to query CSV as virtual tables.

name: Mycelite
summary: A SQLite extension that allows you to synchronize changes from one instance of SQLite to another.

name: SQLPage
summary: A web server driven by SQL queries.

name: SQLedge
summary: A tool to stream changes from Postges to SQLite so the database can run on the edge.

name: SQLSync
summary: A collaborative offline-first wrapper around SQLite. It is designed to synchronize web application state between users, devices, and the edge.

name: Stanchion
summary: A SQLite extension that brings column-oriented tables to SQLite

name: sqlite-schema-diagram
summary: A SQLite schema diagram generator.

name: Optimising SQLite for servers
summary: A tutorial on how to optimise SQLite for backend applications.

name: Redka
summary: Redis re-implemented with SQLite. Contribute to nalgeon/redka development by creating an account on GitHub.
